goal.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce various technologies and applications of artificial intelligence in writing expression so that learners can understand and understand the application of artificial intelligence technology in writing presentations and provide students in the field of human society and non-human society with the opportunity And practice to understand the real impact of artificial intelligence on writing expression. The course content will introduce the basic principles, practical operations, and work exercises of AI writing, AI drawing, AI news, AI question and answer, AI chat robot, AI story, and other applications. Finally, the topic will be explored in a cross-disciplinary group to complete the group topic and deepen students' understanding of AI and writing. Course targets 1. Know and understand artificial intelligence 2. Understand the tools and environment related to the use of artificial intelligence in various creative fields 3. Master basic artificial intelligence skills 4. Group projects that can use artificial intelligence tools for writing projects
goal.ch: 本課程主要目的為介紹各式人工智慧在寫作表達的技術與應用，讓學習者對於人工智慧科技應用於寫作表達有所認識與理解，提供人社領域與非人社領域的學生有機會從案例與實作了解人工智慧對於寫作表達的真實影響。課程內容將介紹AI寫作、AI繪圖、AI新聞、AI問答、AI聊天機器人、AI故事等應用之基本原理、實際操作、作品練習。最後將會以以跨領域小組方式進行專題探索以完成小組專題，深化學生對AI與寫作的理解。 課程目標 1、 認識與了解人工智慧 2、 認識運用人工智慧在各式創造領域相關工具與環境 3、 掌握基本的人工智慧技巧 4、 能運用人工智慧工具進行寫作專題的小組專題實作
